abstract: Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon give us a nearly-Halloween thrill.
snippet: Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon give us a nearly-Halloween thrill.
lead_paragraph: SECOND SUNDAY PUZZLE - I'm still catching my breath from the "Crossing" Words contest, so while I'm mopping my brow, have fun with this nearly-Halloween Acrostic by our own "gorious" constructors, Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon.
